alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 4:01AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cape May County through 430 AM EDT... At 401 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Corbin City to near West Cape May. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocean City, Cape May, Somers Point, Margate City, North Wildwood, Wildwood Crest, Woodbine, Sea Isle City, Avalon, West Cape May, Longport, Stone Harbor, Corbin City, Cape May Court House, Scotch Bonnet, Beesleys Point, Seaville, Dennisville, Strathmere and North Cape May. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 0 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic
